mapper.select: SELECT DRW_NO, DT, BALL_NO1, BALL_NO2, BALL_NO3, BALL_NO4, BALL_NO5, BALL_NO6, BALL_NO7, sum FROM WIN_NO_TB WHERE DRW_NO = #{drwNo}
SELECT DRW_NO, DT, BALL_NO1, BALL_NO2, BALL_NO3, BALL_NO4, BALL_NO5, BALL_NO6, BALL_NO7, sum, odd_cnt FROM ORDER BY DRW_NO DESC LIMIT ${startNo}, ${cnt}
SELECT BALL_NO, SEQ1_CNT, SEQ2_CNT, SEQ3_CNT, SEQ4_CNT, SEQ5_CNT, SEQ6_CNT FROM ball_no_tb

SELECT '최소' BALL_NO, min(ball_no1) SEQ1_CNT, min(ball_no2) SEQ2_CNT, min(ball_no3) SEQ3_CNT, min(ball_no4) SEQ4_CNT, min(ball_no5) SEQ5_CNT, min(ball_no6) SEQ6_CNT from win_no_tb UNION SELECT '평균', round(avg(ball_no1)), round(avg(ball_no2)), round(avg(ball_no3)), round(avg(ball_no4)), round(avg(ball_no5)), round(avg(ball_no6)) FROM win_no_tb UNION SELECT '최대', max(ball_no1), max(ball_no2), max(ball_no3), max(ball_no4), max(ball_no5), max(ball_no6) FROM win_no_tb UNION SELECT '최다', (SELECT ball_no1 FROM win_no_tb GROUP BY ball_no1 ORDER BY count(1) DESC LIMIT 1), (SELECT ball_no2 FROM win_no_tb GROUP BY ball_no2 ORDER BY count(1) DESC LIMIT 1), (SELECT ball_no3 FROM win_no_tb GROUP BY ball_no3 ORDER BY count(1) DESC LIMIT 1), (SELECT ball_no4 FROM win_no_tb GROUP BY ball_no4 ORDER BY count(1) DESC LIMIT 1), (SELECT ball_no5 FROM win_no_tb GROUP BY ball_no5 ORDER BY count(1) DESC LIMIT 1), (SELECT ball_no6 FROM win_no_tb GROUP BY ball_no6 ORDER BY count(1) DESC LIMIT 1) FROM dual UNION select '최근 5건 ', group_concat(ball_no1), group_concat(ball_no2), group_concat(ball_no3), group_concat(ball_no4), group_concat(ball_no5), group_concat(ball_no6) from (select * from win_no_tb order by drw_no desc limit 5 ) a
SELECT SUM_NO, total_cnt, cast(total_rate as decimal(4,3)) total_rate, win_cnt, cast(win_rate as decimal(4,3)) win_rate FROM SUM_NO_TB

SELECT sum(no1) no1RsltCnt , sum(no1)/count(1)*100 no1RsltRate, sum(no2) no2RsltCnt , sum(no2)/count(1)*100 no2RsltRate FROM ( SELECT /* 보너스 번호 미포함 */ a.ball_no1 in ( b.ball_no1, b.ball_no2, b.ball_no3,b.ball_no4,b.ball_no5,b.ball_no6) or a.ball_no2 in ( b.ball_no1, b.ball_no2, b.ball_no3,b.ball_no4,b.ball_no5,b.ball_no6) or a.ball_no3 in ( b.ball_no1, b.ball_no2, b.ball_no3,b.ball_no4,b.ball_no5,b.ball_no6) or a.ball_no4 in ( b.ball_no1, b.ball_no2, b.ball_no3,b.ball_no4,b.ball_no5,b.ball_no6) or a.ball_no5 in ( b.ball_no1, b.ball_no2, b.ball_no3,b.ball_no4,b.ball_no5,b.ball_no6) or a.ball_no6 in ( b.ball_no1, b.ball_no2, b.ball_no3,b.ball_no4,b.ball_no5,b.ball_no6) no1, /* 보너스 번호 포함 */ a.ball_no1 in ( b.ball_no1, b.ball_no2, b.ball_no3,b.ball_no4,b.ball_no5,b.ball_no6) or a.ball_no2 in ( b.ball_no1, b.ball_no2, b.ball_no3,b.ball_no4,b.ball_no5,b.ball_no6) or a.ball_no3 in ( b.ball_no1, b.ball_no2, b.ball_no3,b.ball_no4,b.ball_no5,b.ball_no6) or a.ball_no4 in ( b.ball_no1, b.ball_no2, b.ball_no3,b.ball_no4,b.ball_no5,b.ball_no6) or a.ball_no5 in ( b.ball_no1, b.ball_no2, b.ball_no3,b.ball_no4,b.ball_no5,b.ball_no6) or a.ball_no6 in ( b.ball_no1, b.ball_no2, b.ball_no3,b.ball_no4,b.ball_no5,b.ball_no6) or a.ball_no7 in ( b.ball_no1, b.ball_no2, b.ball_no3,b.ball_no4,b.ball_no5,b.ball_no6) no2 FROM win_no_tb a LEFT JOIN win_no_tb b ON a.drw_no = b.drw_no-1 ) c
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ( DRW_NO, DT, ball_no1, ball_no2, ball_no3, ball_no4, ball_no5, ball_no6, ball_no7, sum, odd_cnt ) values ( #{drwNo}, #{dt}, #{ballNo1}, #{ballNo2}, #{ballNo3}, #{ballNo4}, #{ballNo5}, #{ballNo6}, #{ballNo7}, #{sum}, #{oddCnt} )
